full_summary:
**Title**

Integrated Fourier Transform Infrared (FTIR) and Quantum Cascade Laser (QCL) Imaging Microscopy and Spectrometry System

**Solicitation Number**

WS3815031154

**Public Release Date**

January 10, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**

January 26, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Notice Type**

Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Contracting Entity**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End User Entity**

National Research Council of Canada (NRC)

**System Requirements**

The NRC requires an integrated FTIR and QCL imaging microscopy and spectrometry system. Interested suppliers must provide a statement of capabilities demonstrating that their product or system meets the specifications outlined in the ACAN document.

**Evaluation Criteria**

None

**Geographic Region**

The tender is limited to suppliers within the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents, including the ACAN document, are available on Ariba Discovery.

**Opening and Closing**

The tender closing date and time have been modified. Please disregard the original closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by January 26, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.  The tender contact information is as follows:
Contact: Yessica Karnali (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Please visit the Ariba Discovery website for additional information and to access the tender documents.  The notice URL is: http://discovery.ariba.com
